name: Nodes
title: CS Lymph Nodes
notes:
**Note 1**: Extraosseous plasmacytomas (9734), especially those in the respiratory tract, may metastasize to regional lymph nodes. Use code 100 to document regional lymph node metastasis. 

**Note 2**: Use code 987, not applicable, for the following histologies: Plasmacytoma, NOS (9731) and multiple myeloma (9732).
rows:
